author: Michael Larabel
description: Rust developers acknowledge lengthy compiler times can be a significant issue that limits the productivity of developers working with this programming language. For helping in determining different combinations of issues around compiler performance, the Rust team has started a survey to collect more information on the issues...
title: Rust Surveying Developers To Find Biggest Compiler Performance Issues

author: Michael Larabel
description: For those interested in a high-end motherboard for AMD Ryzen 9000 / 8000 / 7000 series processors that is marketed for creators and equipped with high-end features, the ASUS ProArt X870E-CREATOR WIFI motherboard that retails for $500+ USD will soon see hardware monitoring support under Linux...
title: Linux Sensor Monitoring Coming For The ASUS ProArt X870E-CREATOR WIFI

author: Michael Larabel
description: ReactOS as the "open-source Windows" project providing an operating system with binary compatibility for Windows software and drivers can finally properly handle full-screen games/apps...
title: ReactOS Merges Better Support For Fullscreen Applications

author: Michael Larabel
description: For those with a laptop from Taiwanese OEM/ODM manufacturer Uniwill, two new drivers are being proposed to enhance the mainline Linux kernel support for Uniwill laptops by enabling additional functionality to work under Linux...
title: Uniwill Laptop Driver Proposed For Linux To Enable Additional Features

author: Michael Larabel
description: FreeRDP 3.16 is out today as the newest update to this open-source Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) library and client implementation. This Apache-licensed project continues to be one of the leading implementations of the Microsoft RDP protocol for use outside the confines of Windows...
title: FreeRDP 3.16 Released With Better SDL3 Client Support

author: Michael Larabel
description: The Intel Observation Architecture "OA" performance counters support has been upstreamed to Mesa for upcoming Xe3 Panther Lake integrated graphics...
title: Intel Performance Counters Support Merged To Mesa For Panther Lake
